parsing_result:
# Recording Movies

This section describes how to film movies in auto mode.

1. **Press the DRIVE/DELETE button and select MOVIE in the drive-mode menu.**

   !Drive/Delete Button

2. **Adjust settings for program AE.**

   !Program AE Settings

   | Setting         | Value          | Page |
   |-----------------|----------------|------|
   | ① Shutter speed | A (auto)       | 56   |
   | ② Sensitivity   | A (auto)       | 77   |
   | ③ Aperture      | A (auto)       | 56   |
   | ④ Focus mode    | C (Continuous AF) | 66   |
